{"id":763516976,"lang":"cpp","time":"6 days, 18 hours","timestamp":1659466966,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"55 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/763516976/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.4 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode *dummy = new ListNode(0);\n        ListNode* temp = dummy; int carry  = 0;\n        while(l1 != NULL or l2 != NULL){\n            int firstnum = 0;\n            int secondnum = 0;\n            if(l1 != NULL) firstnum = l1->val, l1 = l1-> next;\n            if(l2 != NULL) secondnum = l2->val, l2 = l2 -> next;\n            int totalsum = firstnum + secondnum + carry;\n            if(totalsum > 9) carry = 1;\n            else carry = 0;\n            ListNode *newNode = new ListNode(totalsum % 10);\n            temp-> next = newNode;\n            temp = newNode;\n        }\n        if(carry != 0) {\n            ListNode *newNode = new ListNode(1);\n            temp-> next = newNode;\n            temp = newNode;\n        }\n        return dummy->next;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
